content.text:
# Futsal Awards

| location    =
| country     =
| presenter   = Futsalplanet.com
| first       = 2000
| number      = 25 (as of 2024)
| last        =
| firstwinner =
| mostwins    = '''Men's Ricardinho (6 wins)Women's Amandinha (8 wins)
| mostrecent  =
| url         = [https://futsalplanet.com Futsalplanet.com]
}}
The JAKO Futsal Awards' are the annual awards to celebrate the best people in international futsal. They are presented since the year of 2000 by FutsalPlanet.
